name: Negligible Difference
description: Surely the difference now is negligible? Your hands could be clean. You could entirely remove yourself from the situation and slip away. No-one would know. Well, except the bandit-philosopher, but do you really want to give him what he wants?

options.name: Human-Dense Track
options.description: Five-hundred humans are tied to the track. It's really quite the sight.

options.name: Slightly Less Dense Track
options.description: Four hundred and ninety nine lives are tied to the track. They all have lives, families, some have children. All will be ripped apart if you chose to pull, and four what, the difference of less than a percent?
